snippet: Baseball is the only one of the four major American professional sports that holds its draft while potential selections are still playing.
abstract: Six players in the College World Series of baseball have been selected in first round of the MLB draft; field is led by ace Vanderbilt pitcher Dansby Swanson, who was picked first; baseball remains only major sport to hold its draft while potential selections are still playing, and drama has increased viewership of the College World Series.
lead_paragraph: Baseball is the only one of the four major American professional sports that holds its draft while potential selections are still playing.

headline.main: 6 First-Rounders Among Draft Picks at College World Series
headline.print_headline: For 6 First-Round Draft Picks, One Last Amateur Hurrah
